String.Source: Oh, pardon my language, milady. I...if it's any consolation, I'm sure she made it to Cyrodiil.
String.Dest: 哦，请原谅我的措辞，女士。我……如果这能算安慰的话，至少我能肯定她已经到了赛瑞迪尔。

String.Source: As a matter of fact milady, I think it was. You're not acquainted with her, are you?
String.Dest: 事实上，我的女士，我认为是这样的。你和她并不熟识，不是吗？

String.Source: What are you in for?
String.Dest: 你是怎么进来的？

String.Source: Would you believe me if I said I was framed? I guess it wouldn't matter much if you did, unless you're the new captain of the guard.
String.Dest: 如果我说我是被冤枉的，你会信吗？我觉得你是否有做过并不重要，除非你是这支警卫队的新队长。

String.Source: What are you in for?
String.Dest: 你是怎么进来的？

String.Source: No, I'm just your average horse thief. I suppose my presence here is proof that I ain't a good one.
String.Dest: 不，我就是个平凡无奇的盗马贼，我想我这行为习惯就足以证明我不是个怎么好的家伙。

String.Source: So you're an adventurer.
String.Dest: 这么说你是个冒险家。

String.Source: I guess you could call it that. I'd say I was a stable hand with a overgrown butterknife.
String.Dest: 我就知道你会那么说。我想说的是：我曾经用一把黄油刀就能闯天下。

String.Source: So you're an adventurer.
String.Dest: 这么说你是个冒险家。

String.Source: When that didn't work, I came crying back to Lady Ashwood, but the old lady was dead. But I was going to work that stable, one way or the other.
String.Dest: When that didn't work, I came crying back to Lady Ashwood, but the old lady was dead. But I was going to work that stable, one way or the other.

String.Source: So you're an adventurer.
String.Dest: 这么说你是个冒险家。

String.Source: Turns out it was the other.
String.Dest: 结果却是另一个。

String.Source: Even the best of us stumble every now and then.
String.Dest: 即使我们之中最好的人也经常会被绊倒。

String.Source: You're too kind, milord. Of course, if we're being completely honest, I might've stumbled on purpose, right into the guard's arms.
String.Dest: 你真是太好了，老爷。当然，如果我们真的完全坦诚相待的话，我可能会故意被绊倒的，被守卫的武器。

String.Source: Even the best of us stumble every now and then.
String.Dest: 即使我们之中最好的人也经常会被绊倒。

String.Source: You're too kind, milady. Of course, if we're being completely honest, I might've stumbled on purpose, right into the guard's arms.
String.Dest: 你真是太好了，夫人。当然，如果我们真的完全坦诚相待的话，我可能会故意被绊倒的，被守卫的武器。

String.Source: Where's the name Lyrik come from?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克这个名字是怎来的？

String.Source: Ma wished for me to become a bard, milord, although she never learned how to spell.
String.Dest: 我妈想让我成为一名吟游诗人，老爷。虽然她大字儿不识一个。

String.Source: Where's the name Lyrik come from?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克这个名字是怎来的？

String.Source: But it turns out it takes more than a name to make a man. My fingers were made for holding a brush rather than a lute.
String.Dest: 事实证明成名对一个人来说很重要。我为画笔而生，而不是鲁特琴。

String.Source: Where's the name Lyrik come from?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克这个名字是怎来的？

String.Source: And my arms were better for stabbing with a pitchfork than pounding a drum.
String.Dest: 我的胳膊用来弹琴比打鼓更适合

String.Source: Where's the name Lyrik come from?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克这个名字是怎来的？

String.Source: But, like a bard, I have been known to tell the guards and prisoners a story or two, to help pass the time.
String.Dest: 但是，如同一个吟游诗人一样，我老是给守卫和犯人们讲一两个故事来解闷儿，都讲出名气来啦。

String.Source: Where's the name Lyrik come from?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克这个名字是怎来的？

String.Source: Ma wished for me to become a bard, milady, although she never learned how to spell.
String.Dest: 我妈想让我成为一名吟游诗人，夫人。虽然她大字儿不识一个。

String.Source: Where's the name Lyrik come from?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克这个名字是怎来的？

String.Source: But it turns out it takes more than a name to make a man. My fingers were made for holding a brush rather than a lute.
String.Dest: 事实证明成名对一个人来说很重要。我为画笔而生，而不是鲁特琴。

String.Source: Where's the name Lyrik come from?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克这个名字是怎来的？

String.Source: And my arms were better for stabbing with a pitchfork than pounding a drum.
String.Dest: 我的胳膊用来弹琴比打鼓更适合

String.Source: Where's the name Lyrik come from?
String.Dest: 莱瑞克这个名字是怎来的？

String.Source: But, like a bard, I have been known to tell the guards and prisoners a story or two, to help pass the time.
String.Dest: 但是，如同一个吟游诗人一样，我老是给守卫和犯人们讲一两个故事来解闷儿，都讲出名气来啦。

String.Source: Let's hear a story then.
String.Dest: 让我们听个故事。

String.Source: For a fellow prisoner, I would be glad to. What shall it be then?
String.Dest: 为了囚犯兄弟，我很乐意。那现在做什么？

String.Source: Let's hear a story then.
String.Dest: 让我们听个故事。

String.Source: It's the least I can do, since you took the time to visit. What shall it be then?
String.Dest: 这是我最起码能做的，因为你抽空来拜访了。你想要什么呢？

String.Source: For the stable hand had not given the headsman a horse, but a donkey.
String.Dest: 那马厩小厮没给侩子手一匹马，却给了他一头驴。

String.Source: What did the stable hand do?
String.Dest: 那个助手做了什么？

String.Source: The stable hand was happy to help, and recommended the headsman start with a gentle mare.
String.Dest: 那个马厩小厮很高兴帮忙，并推荐这位刽子手先从温驯的母马开始。

String.Source: What did the stable hand do?
String.Dest: 那个助手做了什么？

String.Source: But the brute was a prideful Nord, and insisted on riding the meanest, nastiest stallion of the bunch.
String.Dest: 但那个野蛮人是一个高傲的诺德人，而且坚持要骑那群马中最低劣肮脏的公马。

String.Source: What did the stable hand do?
String.Dest: 那个助手做了什么？

String.Source: The stable hand, a bit agitated and weary, walked him over to a steed, and vouched for its wildness.
String.Dest: 那马厩小厮有点激动，还有点疲倦，带着那侩子手到了一匹马前面，向他担保这马绝对野的够劲。

String.Source: This prison is insufferable. Something amusing.
String.Dest: 这个监狱让人无法忍受。有些东西略可笑。

String.Source: Yes, milord. We all know the tale of the headless horseman. Many have even seen it riding through Falkreath.
String.Dest: 是的，老爷。我们都知道无头骑士的故事。许多人甚至亲眼目睹过它骑着马驰骋过佛克瑞斯。

String.Source: This prison is insufferable. Something amusing.
String.Dest: 这个监狱让人无法忍受。有些东西略可笑。

String.Source: But do you know the tale of the "Horseless Headsman?" The executioner of Helgen?
String.Dest: 可你听说过那个“徒步刽子手”的故事吗？海尔根的行刑官？

String.Source: This prison is insufferable. Something amusing.
String.Dest: 这个监狱让人无法忍受。有些东西略可笑。

String.Source: He would often boast about how the Gods gave him two feet, and only cowards relied on four.
String.Dest: 他经常夸夸其谈说上帝给了他两只脚，只有胆小鬼才要用四肢。

String.Source: This prison is insufferable. Something amusing.
String.Dest: 这个监狱让人无法忍受。有些东西略可笑。

String.Source: The truth is, he didn't know how to ride, and everyone knew it. So one night, he stepped outside the walls and woke the lowly stable hand.
String.Dest: 真相是，他不会骑马，可别人都会。所以有天晚上，他溜出城墙，叫醒了一个马厩小厮。

String.Source: This prison is insufferable. Something amusing.
String.Dest: 这个监狱让人无法忍受。有些东西略可笑。

String.Source: Yes, milady. We all know the tale of the headless horseman. Many have even seen it riding through Falkreath.
String.Dest: 是的，夫人。我们都知道无头骑士的故事。许多人甚至亲眼目睹过它骑着马驰骋过佛克瑞斯。

String.Source: This prison is insufferable. Something amusing.
String.Dest: 这个监狱让人无法忍受。有些东西略可笑。

String.Source: But do you know the tale of the "Horseless Headsman?" The executioner of Helgen?
String.Dest: 可你听说过那个“徒步刽子手”的故事吗？海尔根的行刑官？

String.Source: This prison is insufferable. Something amusing.
String.Dest: 这个监狱让人无法忍受。有些东西略可笑。

String.Source: He would often boast about how the Gods gave him two feet, and only cowards relied on four.
String.Dest: 他经常夸夸其谈说上帝给了他两只脚，只有胆小鬼才要用四肢。

String.Source: This prison is insufferable. Something amusing.
String.Dest: 这个监狱让人无法忍受。有些东西略可笑。

String.Source: The truth is, he didn't know how to ride, and everyone knew it. So one night, he stepped outside the walls and woke the lowly stable hand.
String.Dest: 真相是，他不会骑马，可别人都会。所以有天晚上，他溜出城墙，叫醒了一个马厩小厮。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: The whole ride west I had that hagraven at my back, with all kinds of bad thoughts running around in my head.
String.Dest: 整个向西旅程乌鸦鬼婆都紧跟在我身后。我满脑子都是不好的想法。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: I don't know what it was that set me off. Maybe it was just the wind. But I laid my heels into that horse and rode as hard as I could to the city.
String.Dest: 我不知道我到底为什么启程。大概只是因为那风吧。但我还是跨骑到那匹马背上，尽我所能向那座城市疾驰。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: Didn't take long for the guards to figure out the horse wasn't mine. But by Ysmir's beard, at least I'm alive.
String.Dest: 不久那守卫就发现那马不是我的...伊斯米尔的胡子啊！至少我的小命还在。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: The whole ride west I had that hagraven at my back, with all kinds of bad thoughts running around in my head.
String.Dest: 整个向西旅程乌鸦鬼婆都紧跟在我身后。我满脑子都是不好的想法。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: I don't know what it was that set me off. Maybe it was just the wind. But I laid my heels into that horse and rode as hard as I could to the city.
String.Dest: 我不知道我到底为什么启程。大概只是因为那风吧。但我还是跨骑到那匹马背上，尽我所能向那座城市疾驰。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: Didn't take long for the guards to figure out the horse wasn't mine. But by Ysmir's beard, at least I'm alive.
String.Dest: 不久那守卫就发现那马不是我的...伊斯米尔的胡子啊！至少我的小命还在。

String.Source: Did you agree to steal the horses?
String.Dest: 对于要去偷那些马你是否赞同？

String.Source: Well, truth is, I was so sore at the Ashwoods I probably would've stolen the horses for free. But that's no way to make a living.
String.Dest: 唉，事实上Ashwoods那女人真让我头疼，我本可以轻松偷到那些马，但果然还是没办法靠这赚钱啊...

String.Source: Did you agree to steal the horses?
String.Dest: 对于要去偷那些马你是否赞同？

String.Source: I told the boy I only needed one other rider. The girl could wait for us by Peak Shade Tower, and I'd collect the rest of my fee there.
String.Dest: 我跟男孩儿说，我只需要一个其他的骑士。女孩儿可以在峰顶阴影塔楼等着我们，而我会在那儿筹集好我们余下的费用。

String.Source: Did you agree to steal the horses?
String.Dest: 对于要去偷那些马你是否赞同？

String.Source: Except when the job was done, it wasn't the boy waiting for me at the clearing. It was the witch.
String.Dest: 唯一不同的是当任务完成时，在【空地上】等着我的不是那个男孩，而是那女巫。

String.Source: You were scared of a nervous little Breton girl? You coward.
String.Dest: 你怕一个紧张的布莱顿小姑娘？你个懦夫。

String.Source: Not everyone can be as strong and forceful as you milord. I've always been fearful of magic.
String.Dest: 不是每个人都像老爷您那样强健有力的，我就很怕魔法。

String.Source: You were scared of a nervous little Breton girl? You coward.
String.Dest: 你怕一个紧张的布莱顿小姑娘？你个懦夫。

String.Source: And this girl...I swear on Shor's bones she was a bloody hagraven.
String.Dest: 而这个女孩儿……我以舒尔之石的名义起誓，她是个泛着血腥味儿的乌鸦鬼婆。

String.Source: You were scared of a nervous little Breton girl? You coward.
String.Dest: 你怕一个紧张的布莱顿小姑娘？你个懦夫。

String.Source: I almost turned down the job right there, had he not mentioned the Ashwood farm near Helgen.
String.Dest: 我几乎就是在那儿拒绝了一个工作，他只字未提那个海尔根附近的白蜡木农场。

String.Source: You were scared of a nervous little Breton girl? You coward.
String.Dest: 你怕一个紧张的布莱顿小姑娘？你个懦夫。

String.Source: Not everyone can be as strong and forceful as you milady. I've always been fearful of magic.
String.Dest: 不是每个人都像夫人您那样强健有力的，我就很怕魔法。

String.Source: You were scared of a nervous little Breton girl? You coward.
String.Dest: 你怕一个紧张的布莱顿小姑娘？你个懦夫。

String.Source: And this girl...I swear on Shor's bones she was a bloody hagraven.
String.Dest: 而这个女孩儿……我以舒尔之石的名义起誓，她是个泛着血腥味儿的乌鸦鬼婆。

String.Source: You were scared of a nervous little Breton girl? You coward.
String.Dest: 你怕一个紧张的布莱顿小姑娘？你个懦夫。

String.Source: I almost turned down the job right there, had he not mentioned the Ashwood farm near Helgen.
String.Dest: 我几乎就是在那儿拒绝了一个工作，他只字未提那个海尔根附近的白蜡木农场。

String.Source: But the eyes were jewels. Bright as a noble's teeth. I didn't like it one bit, but the Orc and the Khajiit laughed. So I held on to my share.
String.Dest: 但是眼睛是珠宝啊。像贵族的牙齿一样闪闪发亮。我一点都不喜欢，但兽人和虎人开怀大笑。所以决定紧紧抓住我的那份。

String.Source: What became the jewels?
String.Dest: 那这些珠宝如何处理？

String.Source: Last I heard, he was headed toward Helgen. Which is just about the time the dragons came back to Skyrim.
String.Dest: 上次我听说他的消息时，他正在前往海尔根。而那正好是巨龙们重返天际大地的时候。

String.Source: I want to hear about your greatest heist.
String.Dest: 我想听听你干的最大一票案子。

String.Source: Well, milord, I'm just a humble horse thief, and there are no great tales to tell. But I do have "a" story, if you'll lend an ear.
String.Dest: 好吧，老爷，我只是个微不足道的偷马贼，没什么传奇经历可讲。但是我确实有点“小故事”，如果你愿意听的话。

String.Source: I want to hear about your greatest heist.
String.Dest: 我想听听你干的最大一票案子。

String.Source: Well, milady, I'm just a humble horse thief, and there are no great tales to tell. But I do have "a" story, if you'll lend an ear.
String.Dest: 好吧，夫人，我只是个微不足道的偷马贼，没什么传奇经历可讲。但是我确实有点“小故事”，如果你愿意听的话。

String.Source: I believe that you were framed. We must find a way to clear your name.
String.Dest: 我相信你是被陷害的，我们得找个途径让你洗清罪名。

String.Source: I thank you, milord, but my name's been run through enough mud that even the flies won't touch it.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，老爷，但我的名字实在不值一提，就连苍蝇也不想碰它。

String.Source: I believe that you were framed. We must find a way to clear your name.
String.Dest: 我相信你是被陷害的，我们得找个途径让你洗清罪名。

String.Source: I thank you, milady, but my name's been run through enough mud that even the flies won't touch it.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，夫人，但我的名字实在不值一提，就连苍蝇也不想碰它。

String.Source: You're an awful big speck of dust.
String.Dest: 你是一粒大得可怕的灰尘。

String.Source: (Laughs) So I am, milord. But I'm still dust. The guards ignore me, and the flies pay no heed. So why should you!
String.Dest: (笑声）确实如此，我的老爷。但我仍只是浮尘。守卫们无视我，连苍蝇都对我不屑一顾。您又为何要在意我呢！

String.Source: You're an awful big speck of dust.
String.Dest: 你是一粒大得可怕的灰尘。

String.Source: (Laughs) So I am, milady. But I'm still dust. The guards ignore me, and the flies pay no heed. So why should you!
String.Dest: (笑声) 确实如此，我的女士。但我仍只是浮尘。守卫们无视我，连苍蝇都对我不屑一顾。您又为何要在意我呢！

String.Source: That's too bad. I was hoping to have someone to talk to.
String.Dest: 真糟糕。我本来希望找个人聊聊的。

String.Source: Sure milady, I can be that too. A lot of people have told me I'm a good listener, and only half of them were my relatives.
String.Dest: 当然，夫人，我能够做好的。很多人都觉得我是一个很好的倾听者，这其中只有半数是我的亲戚。.

String.Source: That's too bad. I was hoping to have someone to talk to.
String.Dest: 真糟糕。我本来希望找个人聊聊的。

String.Source: Sure milord, I can be that too. A lot of people have told me I'm a good listener, and only half of them were my relatives.
String.Dest: 当然老爷，我可以这样。很多人都说我是一个很好的听众，那些人之中我的亲戚只占一半儿。

String.Source: Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 说说你的事。

String.Source: Certainly, milady. The name's Lyrik. I used to be a stable hand up at the old Ashwood farm in Helgen.
String.Dest: 当然了，我的女士。我的名字是莱瑞克。我曾经在海尔根的老艾什伍德农场当马夫。

String.Source: Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 说说你的事。

String.Source: It wasn't an easy life. The servants used to joke that old Lady Ashwood could teach the military a few things about torture.
String.Dest: 那段日子并不轻松，仆人经常开玩笑说阿什伍德夫人能好好教教军队关于拷问的一些事情。

String.Source: Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 说说你的事。

String.Source: That's why, when I came of age, I took what little money I had left and bought myself a sword.
String.Dest: 所以，一到了年龄，我就把所有攒下的零钱拿去买了把剑。

String.Source: Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 说说你的事。

String.Source: Sure thing, milord. The name's Lyrik. I used to be a stable hand up at the old Ashwood farm in Helgen.
String.Dest: Sure thing, milord. The name's Lyrik. I used to be a stable hand up at the old Ashwood farm in Helgen.

String.Source: Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 说说你的事。

String.Source: It wasn't an easy life. The servants used to joke that old Lady Ashwood could teach the military a few things about torture.
String.Dest: 那段日子并不轻松，仆人经常开玩笑说阿什伍德夫人能好好教教军队关于拷问的一些事情。

String.Source: Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 说说你的事。

String.Source: That's why, when I came of age, I took what little money I had left and bought myself a sword.
String.Dest: 所以，一到了年龄，我就把所有攒下的零钱拿去买了把剑。

String.Source: Was there anything distinctive about this woman?
String.Dest: Was there anything distinctive about this woman?

String.Source: The Breton made me real nervous, always whipping her head around to see if anyone was looking. But it was her hands that caught my eye.
String.Dest: 这布莱顿人让我很紧张，她总是猛的把头转向周围来看是否有人在看着她，但是她的手才是吸引我眼球的地方。

String.Source: Was there anything distinctive about this woman?
String.Dest: Was there anything distinctive about this woman?

String.Source: She had calluses tough as a goat hide, and all the dirt in Skyrim under those fingernails.
String.Dest: 她有羊皮那么坚韧的老茧，而她指甲里的污垢更是比整个天际的泥土都要多。

String.Source: Was there anything distinctive about this woman?
String.Dest: Was there anything distinctive about this woman?

String.Source: She wasn't built like no adventurer. And she wasn't some college mage living in the city either, if you catch my meaning. I think she was a witch.
String.Dest: 她看起来不像冒险者。也不是生活在城镇里的法师。你懂我的意思不。我觉得她是个巫婆。

String.Source: How did you get caught?
String.Dest: 你是怎么被抓住的?

String.Source: It was fear, plain and simple. I was at the Sleeping Giant when I got approached by two shifty folk with hoods covering their eyes.
String.Dest: 恐惧，平静而纯粹。我是在沉睡巨人和那两个诡诈的家伙接触的，他们的双眼都隐藏在帽兜的阴影里。

String.Source: How did you get caught?
String.Dest: 你是怎么被抓住的?

String.Source: The first one sits beside me and buys me a drink, while the other stands in the corner. He goes, "I hear you're the man to see about a horse."
String.Dest: 带头的坐在我旁边为我叫了一杯饮料，而其他则站在角落。他接着说“我听说就是你看到了马。”

String.Source: How did you get caught?
String.Dest: 你是怎么被抓住的?

String.Source: I tell him "Sure milord, I am." He tells me he needs two. One for him, and one for his sweetheart. I'm guessing a Breton girl, by the size of her.
String.Dest: 我告诉他 "是的吾主, 我会的."他告诉我他需要两个. 一个交给他, 另一个给他的甜心. 我考虑找个布莱顿女孩，跟她差不多身段的.

String.Source: What became the jewels?
String.Dest: 那这些珠宝如何处理？

String.Source: Well, the next day, we hitched a ride on a wagon to Riften. The Khajiit said he knew someone in the Guild who could get them appraised.
String.Dest: 嗯，第二天，我们坐上了一架去裂谷的马车。虎人说他认识盗贼工会里懂行情的人。

String.Source: Or she could have been a farm hand.
String.Dest: 或者她以前做过雇农。

String.Source: Of course, that was probably it, milord. But the way she looked around, it was like she was sizing us all up in case she had to kill us.
String.Dest: 当然那很有可能，老爷。不过她四处张望的样子让人觉得她是在估摸着要把我们一网打尽。

String.Source: Or she could have been a farm hand.
String.Dest: 或者她以前做过雇农。

String.Source: I almost turned down the job right there, had he not mentioned the Ashwood farm near Helgen.
String.Dest: 我几乎就是在那儿拒绝了一个工作，他只字未提那个海尔根附近的白蜡木农场。

String.Source: Or she could have been a farm hand.
String.Dest: 或者她以前做过雇农。

String.Source: Of course, that was probably it, milady. But the way she looked around, it was like she was sizing us all up in case she had to kill us.
String.Dest: 当然那很有可能，夫人。不过她四处张望的样子让人觉得她是在估摸着要把我们一网打尽。

String.Source: Or she could have been a farm hand.
String.Dest: 或者她以前做过雇农。

String.Source: I almost turned down the job right there, had he not mentioned the Ashwood farm near Helgen.
String.Dest: 我几乎就是在那儿拒绝了一个工作，他只字未提那个海尔根附近的白蜡木农场。

String.Source: And it was the best decision you ever made.
String.Dest: 这是你有史以来最明智的决定.

String.Source: Not quite, milord, although I appreciate your faith in my abilities. Not even the Divines' blessing could make me a warrior though.
String.Dest: 并非如此，阁下，虽然我很感谢你对我能力的如此信任，但就算是圣灵的祝福，也不能让我成为一名战士。

String.Source: And it was the best decision you ever made.
String.Dest: 这是你有史以来最明智的决定.

String.Source: No, the best decision I ever made was putting the sword down, before some bandit chopped off my arm and put it down for me.
String.Dest: 不，我做的最明智的一次决定就是在某个强盗砍下我的胳膊再把它递给我之前，就把我的剑递给强盗了。

String.Source: And it was the best decision you ever made.
String.Dest: 这是你有史以来最明智的决定.

String.Source: I went crawling back to the old farm to beg for my job back. Except old Lady Ashwood didn't run the place anymore. It was her daughter.
String.Dest: 我巴结着回到原来的农场想要继续我以前的工作。意外的是白蜡木女士不再经营这个农场。现在归她女儿管。

String.Source: And it was the best decision you ever made.
String.Dest: 这是你有史以来最明智的决定.

String.Source: Turns out someone finally made good on their threat to kill the old boss. But her daughter didn't trust any of the old help.
String.Dest: 终于有人像他们威胁的那样杀死了老艾什伍德夫人-前任马厩主。但是她的女儿从来不相信任何来自老家伙的帮助。

String.Source: And it was the best decision you ever made.
String.Dest: 这是你有史以来最明智的决定.

String.Source: That's when I made another decision. If I wasn't going to work with horses, I might as well go into business selling them.
String.Dest: 那是我做的第二个决定。如果不是我得用马干活，我也许就像别人一样把它们都卖了。

String.Source: And it was the best decision you ever made.
String.Dest: 这是你有史以来最明智的决定.

String.Source: Not quite, milady, although I appreciate your faith in my abilities. Not even the Divines' blessing could make me a warrior though.
String.Dest: 我没有那么好，夫人，尽管我感谢您信任我的能力。但，甚至连圣灵的祝福也不能使我成为一名战士。

String.Source: And it was the best decision you ever made.
String.Dest: 这是你有史以来最明智的决定.

String.Source: No, the best decision I ever made was putting the sword down, before some bandit chopped off my arm and put it down for me.
String.Dest: 不，我做的最明智的一次决定就是在某个强盗砍下我的胳膊再把它递给我之前，就把我的剑递给强盗了。

String.Source: And it was the best decision you ever made.
String.Dest: 这是你有史以来最明智的决定.

String.Source: I went crawling back to the old farm to beg for my job back. Except old Lady Ashwood didn't run the place anymore. It was her daughter.
String.Dest: 我巴结着回到原来的农场想要继续我以前的工作。意外的是白蜡木女士不再经营这个农场。现在归她女儿管。

String.Source: And it was the best decision you ever made.
String.Dest: 这是你有史以来最明智的决定.

String.Source: Turns out someone finally made good on their threat to kill the old boss. But her daughter didn't trust any of the old help.
String.Dest: 终于有人像他们威胁的那样杀死了老艾什伍德夫人-前任马厩主。但是她的女儿从来不相信任何来自老家伙的帮助。

String.Source: And it was the best decision you ever made.
String.Dest: 这是你有史以来最明智的决定.

String.Source: That's when I made another decision. If I wasn't going to work with horses, I might as well go into business selling them.
String.Dest: 那是我做的第二个决定。如果不是我得用马干活，我也许就像别人一样把它们都卖了。

String.Source: Do you think that talisman was cursed?
String.Dest: 你认为那个护身符被诅咒了?

String.Source: It's hard to say, milord, as I typically don't believe in such things. But I rather not try my luck.
String.Dest: 我不想这样说，老爷，一般我是不信这些的。可这次还是宁可信其有吧。

String.Source: Do you think that talisman was cursed?
String.Dest: 你认为那个护身符被诅咒了?

String.Source: It's hard to say, milady, as I typically don't believe in such things. But I rather not try my luck.
String.Dest: 这很难断定，夫人，因为我向来是不相信诅咒什么的。但是，我也并不是很乐意赌一把运气。

String.Source: Not anymore you aren't. You're going to help me get out of here.
String.Dest: 从现在起你就不是了。现在帮我离开这鬼地方。

String.Source: Sure milady, whatever you say. But to be honest, I'd probably just get in your way. Don't get me wrong, I'm not a coward, but I act like one.
String.Dest: 好吧，夫人，一切听你的。但是老实说，或许刚刚我碰巧有妨碍到你。请不要误会。我的意思是，虽然我不是一个怕事的人，但是我也不想惹事。

String.Source: Not anymore you aren't. You're going to help me get out of here.
String.Dest: 从现在起你就不是了。现在帮我离开这鬼地方。

String.Source: Unless that's what you need, me getting in the way. Seeing as I can't pick locks, and I can't really fight, that just leaves being a human shield.
String.Dest: 如果这就是你需要的，那我会碍事儿的。鉴于我不会开锁又是个战五渣，剩下的也就只能是当个肉盾了。

String.Source: Not anymore you aren't. You're going to help me get out of here.
String.Dest: 从现在起你就不是了。现在帮我离开这鬼地方。

String.Source: And as much as I'm enjoying your company, I'm not sure if I'm up for that.
String.Dest: 我很喜欢跟你搭伴,并且我想我还没够。

String.Source: Not anymore you aren't. You're going to help me get out of here.
String.Dest: 从现在起你就不是了。现在帮我离开这鬼地方。

String.Source: Sure milord, whatever you say. But to be honest, I'd probably just get in your way. Don't get me wrong, I'm not a coward, but I act like one.
String.Dest: 当然了我的老爷，不管您怎么说。但是说实话，我可能只会碍你的事儿。不要误会，我并不是懦夫，但我笨手笨脚就像个懦夫。

String.Source: Not anymore you aren't. You're going to help me get out of here.
String.Dest: 从现在起你就不是了。现在帮我离开这鬼地方。

String.Source: Unless that's what you need, me getting in the way. Seeing as I can't pick locks, and I can't really fight, that just leaves being a human shield.
String.Dest: 如果这就是你需要的，那我会碍事儿的。鉴于我不会开锁又是个战五渣，剩下的也就只能是当个肉盾了。

String.Source: Not anymore you aren't. You're going to help me get out of here.
String.Dest: 从现在起你就不是了。现在帮我离开这鬼地方。

String.Source: And as much as I'm enjoying your company, I'm not sure if I'm up for that.
String.Dest: 我很喜欢跟你搭伴,并且我想我还没够。

String.Source: What if I helped you escape?
String.Dest: 我帮你逃避又能怎样？

String.Source: That'd be awful kind of you milady, but I don't think that's a good idea. Also, you should probably keep your voice down.
String.Dest: 您太仁慈了我的夫人，但我不认为那是一个好主意。另外，您应该稍稍控制一下您的音量。

String.Source: What if I helped you escape?
String.Dest: 我帮你逃避又能怎样？

String.Source: That'd be awful kind of you milord, but I don't think that's a good idea. Also, you should probably keep your voice down.
String.Dest: 您太仁慈了我的老爷，不过我不觉得这是个好主意。另外，您应该稍微控制下您的音量。

String.Source: Which, I'm guessing, is about the time you discovered the joys of murder.
String.Dest: 我猜，是在你突然发现了谋杀的乐趣的那个时候。

String.Source: Not quite milord, I don't have the skin for that. Old Lady Ashwood, she had an Orc servant though, they say it was him that done her in.
String.Dest: 不是那样的啊老爷，我才不是那种人。艾什伍德老夫人有个兽人仆从，他们说是那个兽人杀了她的。

String.Source: Which, I'm guessing, is about the time you discovered the joys of murder.
String.Dest: 我猜，是在你突然发现了谋杀的乐趣的那个时候。

String.Source: Makes sense, as she gave him the worst of it. But I don't know, he didn't seem like the kind who would ever crack.
String.Dest: 讲得通，她把最糟糕的给了他。但我不明白，他看起来也不像是什么都能扛住的那种人啊。

String.Source: Which, I'm guessing, is about the time you discovered the joys of murder.
String.Dest: 我猜，是在你突然发现了谋杀的乐趣的那个时候。

String.Source: Either way, eventually the young mistress took over. When my adventuring days ended, I came crawling back for a job.
String.Dest: 无论哪种方式，最终这名年轻的女主人[接管了我。]当我结束了一天的冒险之后，我还得爬回去工作。

String.Source: Which, I'm guessing, is about the time you discovered the joys of murder.
String.Dest: 我猜，是在你突然发现了谋杀的乐趣的那个时候。

String.Source: Young Lady Ashwood didn't trust the old help though, so I didn't have a leg to stand on. So I took four of them and rode off to Riverwood.
String.Dest: 艾什伍德小姐并不信任老家伙, 所以我连插一脚的机会都没有.我带着他们当中的四个跑到河木镇.

String.Source: Which, I'm guessing, is about the time you discovered the joys of murder.
String.Dest: 我猜，是在你突然发现了谋杀的乐趣的那个时候。

String.Source: Oh no, milady, I don't have the skin for that. Old Lady Ashwood, she had an Orc servant though, they say it was him that done her in.
String.Dest: 哦不，夫人，我没怎么惊讶于此。不过老女士阿树，她有一个兽人仆从。他们说是他杀了她。

String.Source: Which, I'm guessing, is about the time you discovered the joys of murder.
String.Dest: 我猜，是在你突然发现了谋杀的乐趣的那个时候。

String.Source: Makes sense, as she gave him the worst of it. But I don't know, he didn't seem like the kind who would ever crack.
String.Dest: 讲得通，她把最糟糕的给了他。但我不明白，他看起来也不像是什么都能扛住的那种人啊。

String.Source: Which, I'm guessing, is about the time you discovered the joys of murder.
String.Dest: 我猜，是在你突然发现了谋杀的乐趣的那个时候。

String.Source: Either way, eventually the young mistress took over. When my adventuring days ended, I came crawling back for a job.
String.Dest: 无论哪种方式，最终这名年轻的女主人[接管了我。]当我结束了一天的冒险之后，我还得爬回去工作。

String.Source: Which, I'm guessing, is about the time you discovered the joys of murder.
String.Dest: 我猜，是在你突然发现了谋杀的乐趣的那个时候。

String.Source: Young Lady Ashwood didn't trust the old help though, so I didn't have a leg to stand on. So I took four of them and rode off to Riverwood.
String.Dest: 艾什伍德小姐并不信任老家伙, 所以我连插一脚的机会都没有.我带着他们当中的四个跑到河木镇.

String.Source: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood? That's my wife.
String.Dest: 白蜡木? 是维若林．阿树吗？那是我妻子。

String.Source: You married the young mistress? (Laughs) You must be quite the adventurer. I've heard she is a handful.
String.Dest: 你娶了小夫人? (笑声) 你真够冒险的. 我听说她很难搞.

String.Source: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood? That's my wife.
String.Dest: 白蜡木? 是维若林．阿树吗？那是我妻子。

String.Source: I suppose there's no harm in telling you, since I'm already in jail and Helgen is burned to the ground, but Ashwood farm is where I got my start.
String.Dest: 我想告诉你也没什么坏处，毕竟海尔根已经被烧成了废土我也已经入狱了，但是艾什伍德农场是我一切开始的地方。

String.Source: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood? That's my wife.
String.Dest: 白蜡木? 是维若林．阿树吗？那是我妻子。

String.Source: Not as a stable hand, but as a horse thief. When old lady Ashwood was murdered, the young mistress fired all the servants.
String.Dest: 不是作为一个可靠的帮手，而是作为一个偷马贼。白蜡木老夫人被谋杀了之后，年轻的女主人把所有仆人都解雇了。

String.Source: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood? That's my wife.
String.Dest: 白蜡木? 是维若林．阿树吗？那是我妻子。

String.Source: So I decided to head over to the stables and help myself.
String.Dest: 所以我决定直接去马棚自取所需。

String.Source: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood?
String.Dest: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood?

String.Source: You know the mistress? That makes one of us. She never talked to the help. I was referring to her mother. Old Lady Ashwood.
String.Dest: You know the mistress? That makes one of us. She never talked to the help. I was referring to her mother. Old Lady Ashwood.

String.Source: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood?
String.Dest: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood?

String.Source: Although from what I hear, the young lady got just as much of the whip as the rest of us. The old lady was a hard woman, but she got results.
String.Dest: 虽然我听说，年轻女士的被鞭打的次数和我们一样多。这夫人是冷酷无情的女人，但她得到了应有的结局。

String.Source: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood?
String.Dest: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood?

String.Source: Not always the kind she wanted though. They say the old lady was murdered. Maybe by that Orc. Either way, the young mistress fired the old help.
String.Dest: Not always the kind she wanted though. They say the old lady was murdered. Maybe by that Orc. Either way, the young mistress fired the old help.

String.Source: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood?
String.Dest: Ashwood? As in Veralene Ashwood?

String.Source: So I decided to head over to the stables and help myself.
String.Dest: 所以我决定直接去马棚自取所需。

String.Source: And you better stay that way, or I'm going to make your life unpleasant.
String.Dest: 你最好继续这样，不然我不会让你好过的。

String.Source: You're a tough one, huh. I'd be careful who you advertise that to. The guards, they like to take the tough ones down a notch.
String.Dest: 你是一个坚强的人，呵呵。我建议你小心那些守卫，他们喜欢用下三滥的招数折磨人。

String.Source: And you better stay that way, or you'll end up on the executioner's block.
String.Dest: 并且你最好呆在那，否则你会死于行刑者的斩首。

String.Source: Ha, at this point that wouldn't be so bad. Beats chewing on loaves of bricks for the rest of my life.
String.Dest: 哈，在这一点上还不算太坏。至少好过我余生只能嚼硬面包。

String.Source: So what? I have no sympathy for lawbreakers.
String.Dest: So what? I have no sympathy for lawbreakers.

String.Source: Of course, milord, you know best. The punishment always fits the crime.
String.Dest: Of course, milord, you know best. The punishment always fits the crime.

String.Source: Of course, milady, you know best. The punishment always fits the crime.
String.Dest: Of course, milady, you know best. The punishment always fits the crime.

String.Source: So what? I have no sympathy for lawbreakers.
String.Dest: So what? I have no sympathy for lawbreakers.

String.Source: Just some lovestruck boy, milord. The witch probably cast a spell on him. More chambermaid than tavern wench, from what little I could see of her.
String.Dest: 只是个痴情的男孩，老爷。可能是着了那个巫婆的道。就我所知，那个女人更像是贵族家的女仆，而不是旅馆的女佣。

String.Source: What about the male? Who was he?
String.Dest: 男性怎么样？他是谁？

String.Source: His plan was to steal a few horses by the old Ashwood farm near Helgen, and cross the border from the west near Falkreath.
String.Dest: 他计划要从海尔根附近的老艾什伍德农场偷几匹马，然后从佛克瑞斯的西边越境。

String.Source: What about the male? Who was he?
String.Dest: 男性怎么样？他是谁？

String.Source: Just some lovestruck boy, milady. The witch probably cast a spell on him. More chambermaid than tavern wench, from what little I could see of her.
String.Dest: 只是个痴情的男孩，夫人。可能是着了那个巫婆的道。就我所知，那个女人更像是贵族家的女仆，而不是旅馆的女佣。

String.Source: What about the male? Who was he?
String.Dest: 男性怎么样？他是谁？

String.Source: His plan was to steal a few horses by the old Ashwood farm near Helgen, and cross the border from the west near Falkreath.
String.Dest: 他计划要从海尔根附近的老艾什伍德农场偷几匹马，然后从佛克瑞斯的西边越境。

String.Source: What about the male? Who was he?
String.Dest: 男性怎么样？他是谁？

String.Source: Of course, milord, it's just as you say. Although I'd remind you you're in the same place.
String.Dest: 当然, 老爷, 听你的. 尽管我要提醒你还在同一个地方.

String.Source: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.
String.Dest: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.

String.Source: But I'm sure you failed at something far more grand than simple horse thievery to get yourself in here.
String.Dest: 但我很确定你失败的事情远比在这里把马窃为己有要简单的多。

String.Source: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.
String.Dest: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.

String.Source: Of course, milady, it's just as you say. Although I'd remind you you're in the same place.
String.Dest: 是的，女士，您说得一点不错。只不过我得提醒你自己现在的处境也是一模一样的哦。

String.Source: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.
String.Dest: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.

String.Source: But I'm sure you failed at something far more grand than simple horse thievery to get yourself in here.
String.Dest: 但我很确定你失败的事情远比在这里把马窃为己有要简单的多。

String.Source: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.
String.Dest: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.

String.Source: Of course, milady, it's just as you say. We're both standing here, in a jail. Although only one of us came of their own accord.
String.Dest: 当然，夫人，就像你说的。我们都在监狱里。 尽管只有一个人是自愿进来的。

String.Source: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.
String.Dest: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.

String.Source: Granted, I'd rather be where you're standing, just not facing the cell.
String.Dest: 当然，我宁愿站在你那个位置也不愿站在这里面朝着牢房。

String.Source: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.
String.Dest: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.

String.Source: Of course, milord, it's just as you say. We're both standing here, in a jail. Although only one of us came of their own accord.
String.Dest: 当然，老爷，如你所述。我们都呆在这儿，呆在监狱里。虽然只有一个人是自愿来的。

String.Source: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.
String.Dest: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.

String.Source: Granted, I'd rather be where you're standing, just not facing the cell.
String.Dest: 当然，我宁愿站在你那个位置也不愿站在这里面朝着牢房。

String.Source: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.
String.Dest: Worse than average. You're obviously terrible at it, to be here.

String.Source: Oh, don't I know it, milord. I stuck out like a mudcrab in the snow. Did more running than adventuring.
String.Dest: 哦,我不知道,老爷。我像一只雪地里打滚的泥沼蟹一样陷入麻烦了。与其说是冒险不如说是瞎跑。

String.Source: You should've stayed on the farm, boy.
String.Dest: 你本应当待在农场里。孩子

String.Source: I tried finding work at other stables, even went back to Lady Ashwood's. But by then the young mistress had taken over.
String.Dest: 我去了不少马厩找工作，甚至去过艾什伍德女士家。可那时候她已经被【接走】了。

String.Source: You should've stayed on the farm, boy.
String.Dest: 你本应当待在农场里。孩子

String.Source: They say the old lady was murdered. Maybe by that Orc. Either way, the young mistress fired the old help.
String.Dest: 他们说有个老太太被谋杀了。也许是兽人干的。无论如何，年轻的女主人都会解雇这个老迈的仆人。

String.Source: You should've stayed on the farm, boy.
String.Dest: 你本应当待在农场里。孩子

String.Source: So I decided to head over to the stables and help myself.
String.Dest: 所以我决定直接去马棚自取所需。

String.Source: You should've stayed on the farm, boy.
String.Dest: 你本应当待在农场里。孩子

String.Source: Oh, don't I know it, milady. I stuck out like a mudcrab in the snow. Did more running than adventuring.
String.Dest: 哦,我不知道,夫人。我像一只雪地里打滚的泥沼蟹一样陷入麻烦了。与其说是冒险不如说是瞎跑。

String.Source: You should've stayed on the farm, boy.
String.Dest: 你本应当待在农场里。孩子

String.Source: I tried finding work at other stables, even went back to Lady Ashwood's. But by then the young mistress had taken over.
String.Dest: 我去了不少马厩找工作，甚至去过艾什伍德女士家。可那时候她已经被【接走】了。

String.Source: You should've stayed on the farm, boy.
String.Dest: 你本应当待在农场里。孩子

String.Source: They say the old lady was murdered. Maybe by that Orc. Either way, the young mistress fired the old help.
String.Dest: 他们说有个老太太被谋杀了。也许是兽人干的。无论如何，年轻的女主人都会解雇这个老迈的仆人。

String.Source: You should've stayed on the farm, boy.
String.Dest: 你本应当待在农场里。孩子

String.Source: So I decided to head over to the stables and help myself.
String.Dest: 所以我决定直接去马棚自取所需。

String.Source: You should've stayed on the farm, boy.
String.Dest: 你本应当待在农场里。孩子

String.Source: You've got a keen eye, milord. Not everyone notices that when I tell them what I'm in for.
String.Dest: You've got a keen eye, milord. Not everyone notices that when I tell them what I'm in for.

String.Source: Odd. Last time I checked, Falkreath didn't have a stable.
String.Dest: Odd. Last time I checked, Falkreath didn't have a stable.

String.Source: You've got a keen eye, milady. Not everyone notices that when I tell them what I'm in for.
String.Dest: You've got a keen eye, milady. Not everyone notices that when I tell them what I'm in for.

String.Source: Odd. Last time I checked, Falkreath didn't have a stable.
String.Dest: Odd. Last time I checked, Falkreath didn't have a stable.

String.Source: Easier said than done, milord. The Khajiit and the Orc already didn't trust each other, and I wanted no part of the thing.
String.Dest: 说起来容易做起来难，老爷。虎人和兽人已经互不信任了，而我不想在这件事里再掺一脚了。

String.Source: You probably should have kept the jewels on the talisman.
String.Dest: 也许你当时应该把珠宝留在护符上。

String.Source: If we didn't break the talisman and split the jewels, it probably would've ended with them killing each other anyway.
String.Dest: 除非我们破坏掉这个护符并瓜分掉珠宝，否则他们或许会一直自相残杀下去。

String.Source: You probably should have kept the jewels on the talisman.
String.Dest: 也许你当时应该把珠宝留在护符上。

String.Source: Easier said than done, milady. The Khajiit and the Orc already didn't trust each other, and I wanted no part of the thing.
String.Dest: 说起来容易做起来难，夫人。虎人和兽人已经互不信任了，而我不想在这件事里再掺一脚了。

String.Source: You probably should have kept the jewels on the talisman.
String.Dest: 也许你当时应该把珠宝留在护符上。

String.Source: If we didn't break the talisman and split the jewels, it probably would've ended with them killing each other anyway.
String.Dest: 除非我们破坏掉这个护符并瓜分掉珠宝，否则他们或许会一直自相残杀下去。

String.Source: You probably should have kept the jewels on the talisman.
String.Dest: 也许你当时应该把珠宝留在护符上。

String.Source: Oh, right milord. I thought I told you I didn't have one, but maybe I wasn't clear. My mistake.
String.Dest: Oh, right milord. I thought I told you I didn't have one, but maybe I wasn't clear. My mistake.

String.Source: I told you I wanted a heist story, not a story about cursed thieves.
String.Dest: 都跟你说了我要的是一个抢劫案，而不是什么被诅咒的毛贼的故事！

String.Source: Oh, right milady. I thought I told you I didn't have one, but maybe I wasn't clear. My mistake.
String.Dest: Oh, right milady. I thought I told you I didn't have one, but maybe I wasn't clear. My mistake.

String.Source: I told you I wanted a heist story, not a story about cursed thieves.
String.Dest: 都跟你说了我要的是一个抢劫案，而不是什么被诅咒的毛贼的故事！

String.Source: A visitor! Always good to see a new face. Don't mind me though...just think of me as dust on the wall.
String.Dest: 有访客！看到新面孔总是很开心。不过别在意我……就当我是墙角的一撮灰尘吧。

String.Source: Ah, you're up. Always good to see a new face. Don't mind me though...just think of me as dust on the wall.
String.Dest: 啊，轮到你了。看到新面孔总是很开心。不过不用介意我...就当我是墙角的一撮灰尘吧。

String.Source: Yes milord, I figured that's why they needed me, since I used to work the stables for the Ashwoods near Helgen.
String.Dest: 是的老爷，我发现他们会需要我，是因为我曾在海尔根附近的白蜡木马厩工作过。

String.Source: Sounds like they were on the run.
String.Dest: 听说他们逃跑了。

String.Source: Except the gate was too heavily guarded. Falkreath was off the main road, but safer for a witch I take it.
String.Dest: 刨去城门太过戒备森严不提，佛克瑞斯远离主路，我猜对那个女巫来说会相对安全些。

String.Source: Sounds like they were on the run.
String.Dest: 听说他们逃跑了。

String.Source: Yes milady, I figured that's why they needed me, since I used to work the stables for the Ashwoods near Helgen.
String.Dest: 好的夫人，我想着就是为什么他们需要我，因为我曾经在靠近圣地镇的Ashwoods马房工作过。

String.Source: Sounds like they were on the run.
String.Dest: 听说他们逃跑了。

String.Source: Except the gate was too heavily guarded. Falkreath was off the main road, but safer for a witch I take it.
String.Dest: 刨去城门太过戒备森严不提，佛克瑞斯远离主路，我猜对那个女巫来说会相对安全些。

String.Source: Sounds like they were on the run.
String.Dest: 听说他们逃跑了。

String.Source: I never made it to Riften. I didn't dare go anywhere. Figured if there was one place holy enough to keep me safe, it was Ivarstead.
String.Dest: 我从来没去过裂谷城。我不敢到任何地方去。我发现世界上只有一处圣地能容我安全，那就是裂谷城。

String.Source: One day, a Nord man comes by the inn. We get to talking, and it turns out he's a horse thief.
String.Dest: 有一天，一个诺德男人进来这家酒馆。我们开始聊天，原来他是偷马贼。

String.Source: I tell him the story and show him the gems. He says he'll be glad to take them off my hands.
String.Dest: 我给他讲了这个故事并给他看那块儿宝石。他说他很高兴把他们从我手中抢走。

String.Source: Only on the way, the Orc, he stands up from his seat for no reason at all. Next thing we know, he hits his head on a branch, and dies instantly.
String.Dest: 只是在过程中，这个兽人，他从他的座位上毫无征兆地站起来。然后我们看到的是，他一头撞向一个树杈，当场就死了。

String.Source: The Khajiit laughs, and tells me our cut just got bigger. But two days later at Ivarstead, he chokes on a bloody horse haunch.
String.Dest: 这个虎人笑了，而且告诉我我们的切口只是变得更大了。但是在两天后的紫杉镇，他被带血的马的腰腿肉呛到了。

String.Source: I was traveling down a road with an Orc and a Khajiit, an odd trio to be sure. We were east of Helgen when we spotted a cart, ransacked by bandits.
String.Dest: 我与一个兽人和一个虎人一起旅行，挺奇怪的三人组对吧。然后当到了海尔根东面的一架手推车附近的时候，我们被一帮强盗给洗劫了。

String.Source: We didn't expect to find anything, but the horse had just been slain, and we hadn't eaten for days.
String.Dest: 我们不指望找到什么，但这头马刚刚被杀，而我们好几天没吃东西了。

String.Source: Only when we slit open its belly, we found more than flesh. A small linen wrap, likely stashed by one of the bandtis hiding a share of the spoils.
String.Dest: 我们只在切开腹部的时候找到了些东西，除了肉之外，还有一个亚麻包裹，像是这些土匪之一藏分得的战利品一样被藏了起来。

String.Source: We unrolled the wrap, but none of us were prepared for what was inside. It was some sort of talisman, a foul thing with a goblin's head and 3 eyes.
String.Dest: 我们打开了包裹，但对里面的东西都毫无准备。这是护身符的一种，把某种肮脏的东西跟一颗哥布林的头和三个眼球放在一起做成的。

String.Source: For weeks the headsman trained, until he was confident that he could ride without assistance.
String.Dest: 需要经过几周的训练他才能有不需要别人辅助，自己独立骑行的信心。

String.Source: So, one day, to prove he could ride as well as any man, he challenged a few of the guards to a race.
String.Dest: 于是，某天，为了证明他的骑术比任何人都要优秀，他以一些守卫为对手进行了一场骑赛比试。

String.Source: Only when he trotted out his steed to the starting line, the entire city fell to their knees with laughter.
String.Dest: 只是当他纵马前往起始线时，整个城市的人都笑倒在地。

String.Source: You here to make a purchase? No, I'm kidding.
String.Dest: 你想在这里买吗？嘿，我是开玩笑的。

String.Source: Need something?
String.Dest: 有事吗？

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Oh, all right then.
String.Dest: 哦，那好吧。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: Thanks for coming.
String.Dest: 谢谢光临。

String.Source: I'd say goodbye, but well...let's face it. Neither of us are going anywhere.
String.Dest: 我想道个别，但是……呃，好吧，让我们一起面对吧。我们俩哪儿也去不了。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。
